parameters.text: The default tooltip looks like this.
The tooltip can be placed on four different sides in relation to the reference element. Additionally, it can be aligned to the reference element edge, rather than being centered.
The arrow that points toward the element, and can be disabled completely.
You can style the text color and background color.
Your tooltip can delay hiding or showing after a trigger.
The tooltips can be triggered by hover, click or via signals.
Tooltips can be interactive, allowing you to hover over and click inside.

parameters.content: You can select the text inside here.

parameters.text: Tooltips can follow the mouse cursor and abide by a certain axis. Additionally, the tooltip can follow the cursor until it shows, at which point it will stop following (initial).
